phases.description: Build the core 'dopamine loop' (Upload GPX -> Clear the Clouds) for a single user on the Web.

tasks.title: Initialize Next.js App
tasks.description: Scaffold Next.js 14+ project with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS.

tasks.title: Setup Mapbox Keys
tasks.description: Acquire Public Token (Frontend) and Secret Token (Backend/Matching) from Mapbox. Add to .env.local.

tasks.title: Setup Supabase Project
tasks.description: Initialize Supabase project. Enable PostGIS extension. Enable Auth (Google/Magic Link).

tasks.title: Render Base Map (react-map-gl)
tasks.description: Create 'BoroughMap' component. Render Mapbox dark-v11 style. Ensure full-screen rendering in Next.js layout.

tasks.title: Auto-Zoom to Borough (Turf.js)
tasks.description: Implement @turf/bbox logic to automatically calculate bounds of the borough GeoJSON and snap the camera to it on load.

tasks.title: Fetch & Display Borough Boundary
tasks.description: Fetch 'Brooklyn' GeoJSON from Supabase (or mock file) and render it as a colored fill layer.

tasks.title: GPX Drag-and-Drop UI
tasks.description: Create a file upload zone over the map that accepts .gpx files.

tasks.title: Process GPX to H3 Hexagons
tasks.description: Backend/Edge Function: Parse GPX -> Map Match -> Convert to H3 Indices -> Upsert to DB.
